overview: Full length 4×4 Vehicle Equipment DVD video from the world’s most popular DVD series, first published in 2000, and revised in 2008. This is the third of Andrew St Pierre White’s 4×4 skills videos, with over 60 000 VHS tapes and DVDs sold worldwide. In this series are 4×4 RECOVERY, 4X4 OVERLAND and 4×4 DRIVING SKILLS.
title: 4x4 Vehicle Equipment
